statements: SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE id = 1

SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT product_name, market_segment FROM market_trends ORDER BY market_segment DESC

SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE market_segment = 'Technology' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE market_segment = 'Food' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT market_segment) AS segment_count FROM market_trends;

SELECT product_name, category, sales_volume FROM market_trends WHERE sales_volume > 5000;

SELECT product_name, category, price FROM market_trends WHERE sales_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY category, price;

SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM target_customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
